Primary Energy: Space 4 (altering size + close range) Supporting Energy: Time 2 (duration 1 minute) Range: Close, 30 ft. Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 6 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Target at close range grows or shrinks one size category. Enlarge: add [[/damage 1 type=to]] damage dice, Misfortune on Stealth. Reduce: subtract [[/damage 1 type=from]] damage dice, Fortune on Stealth. Unwilling targets get [[/save type=fortitude]]. Saving Throw: Fortitude Success Scaling: 0 = no effect (if unwilling), 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 10 minutes, 4 = 1 hour, 5 = 4 hours
